WorkItem.ClosedComment: You'll need to use the latest version of Web Essentials (not sure what that currently is). If you see issues with that, you'll need to follow up with the Web Essentials owner - we don't have any control over that codepath. Thanks.
WorkItem.Description:
I've installed WebEssentials and TypeScript 8.2.0, and after some issues with VS I've finally started project and make some few 'tests' - which work perfectly, but when I started to setup few frameworks (knockout.d.ts + knockout.js etc) VS starts to loosing TypeScript compiler

/*
Compile Error. 
See error list for details
 The TypeScript compiler couldn't be found. Download http://www.typescriptlang.org/#Download
*/

I've uninstalled and installed TypeScript and WebEssentials but that solve problem for 1 (one!) build, and problem come back.


OS: Windows 8 64bit
VS 2012 + TypeScript 0.8.2 + WebEssentials 2012.
